hero.title: FeedChange
hero.subtitle: Simple, private tracking for your baby's feeding and diaper changes. No accounts, no emails, no tracking - just pure functionality.

noEmail.title: No Email Required
noEmail.description: Start tracking immediately without creating an account or providing any personal information.

zeroTracking.title: Zero Tracking
zeroTracking.description: No analytics, no cookies, no data collection. Your baby's information stays private.

autoCleanup.title: Auto-Cleanup
autoCleanup.description: All data is automatically deleted after 7 days of inactivity. No manual cleanup needed.

secureHosting.title: Secure Database Hosting
secureHosting.description: Your data is securely stored in Cloudflare's D1 database with enterprise-grade security and automatic routine cleanup to ensure your information never accumulates unnecessarily.

feeding.title: Feeding Sessions
feeding.bottleSize: Track bottle size and amount consumed

step1.title: Create Baby Profile
step1.description: Add your baby's name, weight, and current bottle size. No personal details required.

step2.title: Track Daily Activities
step2.description: Log feeding sessions and diaper changes with our intuitive interface.

step3.title: Monitor Progress
step3.description: View feeding patterns and diaper change frequency over time.

privacyBadge.title: Privacy-First Design
privacyBadge.description: FeedChange is built with your privacy in mind. We believe you shouldn't have to sacrifice privacy to track your baby's development. That's why we don't collect emails, don't track your usage, and automatically clean up data after 7 days of inactivity.
